    • Method Detail

      • getConsensusSequence

        public NucleotideSequence getConsensusSequence()
        Description copied from interface: Contig
        Get the consensus sequence of this contig. The Consensus is determined by the underlying reads that make up this contig. Different consensus callers can create different consensus using various criteria and paramters.
        Specified by:
        getConsensusSequence in interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
        Returns:
        the consensus of this contig as NucleotideSequence; will never be null.
        See Also:
        ConsensusCaller

        Description copied from interface: Contig

        Returns:

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the number of reads in this contig; will always be ≥ 0.

      • getRead

        public T getRead(String id)
        Description copied from interface: Contig
        Get the AssembledRead in this contig with the given id.
        Specified by:
        getRead in interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the read to get.
        Returns:
        the AssembledRead with that id; or null if no such read exists in this contig.
        See Also:
        Contig.containsRead(String)

      • getReadIterator

        public StreamingIterator<T> getReadIterator()
        Description copied from interface: Contig
        Get the StreamingIterator of AssembledReads that are contained in this contig.
        Specified by:
        getReadIterator in interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
        Returns:
        a StreamingIterator of AssembledReads; will never be null and never contain any null elements, but could be empty.

      • reads

        public ThrowingStream<T> reads()
        Description copied from interface: Contig
        Create a Stream of the AssembledReads in this contig. By default, this method delegates to Contig.getReadIterator()'s StreamingIterator.toThrowingStream() method.
        Specified by:
        reads in interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
        Returns:
        a new ThrowingStream of reads.

      • containsRead

        public boolean containsRead(String placedReadId)
        Description copied from interface: Contig
        Does this contig have a AssembledRead with the given id?
        Specified by:
        containsRead in interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
        Parameters:
        placedReadId - the id of the AssembledRead to check for.
        Returns:
        true if this contig has a read with the given id; false otherwise.
